title: TuneIn Radio Pro v11.0 Android
description:
TuneIn is a new way to listen to the world through live local and global radio from wherever you are. Whether you want music, sports, news or current events, TuneIn offers over 50,000 stations and 1.2 million on-demand programs for you to choose from. 

The TuneIn Radio Pro app for Android puts this entire experience in the palm of your hand with the added benefit of recording what youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re listening to (requires memory card).

Important Update: This new version of TuneIn (5.3) includes Car Mode, which lets you listen to your favorite music, sports and news simply by speaking a command into your Android phone or tablet. This update also includes extra large buttons for easy viewing and control.

What's in this version : (Updated : Nov 19, 2013)
We've made updates to the TuneIn Live screen, including improved layouts when using your tablet in landscape or portrait mode
We've addressed issues which were affecting the Sleep Timer and Alarm functionality
We've fixed issues and bugs which were causing crashes and other errors
We've fixed several issues with buffering and playback while your screen is off
We've fixed issues with pre-roll audio advertisements playing too frequently
Required Android O/S : 1.6+
